channel.title: Item.java isn't working
channel.description: So i added some of my custom items, D claws, D pl8, ect. and anyways when i added the item ids to the item.java and i compiled... and then restarted server... when i went to weild i could still weild a shield and the dragon claws at the same time. Please tell me whats wrong.

item.title: Item.java isn't working
item.dc:creator: @Ags_Rush Ags Rush
item.description:
@Ags_Rush wrote:

Check your weapon handler file. And search for your d claw’s item code. Then look to see if it’s two handed or not.

Read full topic

and i compiled… and then restarted server… when i went to weild i could still weild a shield and the dragon claws at the same time. Please tell me whats wrong.
